TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content: I'm looking for anyone who can do SCF today (or whenever this friday is in your timezone.)
Tell you what, if nobody else steps up in the next few hours I think I might be able to do it, although I can't guarantee anything, and it may be delayed until tomorrow.

Sorry, but it looks like my work isn't going to be finished in time to do SCF. I feel horrible washing out like this, but I'm only halfway done with what I planned to do today and it's 4:00pm already.

Why can't it just be a normal PowerPoint? I would be done in half an hour if it were, but nooo, it has to be in this obscure format that has to be exactly 6 minutes and 40 seconds long, have 20 slides, and can only have a limited amount of text and images per slide! Thanks, AP Language and Composition, everyone loves homework in July!     /rant

I've been neck deep in trying to mod Silent Hunter 5 since noon (it's now 7:00pm where I live) only to find that one of the programs I need to get the steam version of the game to work with another program required by the mod I'm trying to install won't work because it says it's missing files.... The very file it says it's missing it literally ten files below the program in my folder, it is not missing. Kill me now.  I quit.

Compared to this nightmare, modding KSP is laughably easy, so count your blessings

**Anyway,** I can still do SCF, but I won't be able to get to it until tomorrow, because I really should eat and rest, this has been draining. Sorry.

The worst part about this? I don't even like Silent Hunter 5, I'm only doing this because Silent Hunter III is really unstable with the supermod I'm running it with.
